description: Try our easy to follow Grilled Lamb Rump Steaks with Rosemary-Caper Baste, Lettuce Wedge Salad & Ranch Dressing recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Grilled Lamb Rump Steaks with Rosemary-Caper Baste, Lettuce Wedge Salad & Ranch Dressing Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Use a sharp knife to score the lamb rump steaks all over in fine parallel lines, then season with salt and pepper. Combine the rosemary, garlic, capers, zest, juice and olive oil in a jug and pur√©e with a stick blender until smooth. Mix with the lamb and set aside to marinate for at least 10 minutes, but not more than 30 minutes.

Arrange the lamb rump steaks on a hot barbecue grill and cook, basting every two minutes with the remaining marinade, until the meat is cooked to your liking. For medium-rare allow 4 minutes, turning often. For medium, 8 minutes, turning often. For well done allow 10 minutes, turning often.
Cut the lettuce into wedges. Carve the lamb and arrange on plates, then place a lettuce wedge alongside. Drizzle with ranch dressing, sprinkle with chives, then add a bunch of truss cherry tomatoes.
